citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:18 am on
05/28/2015. Inspector attempted to make contact by ringing and knocking on the door. Made telephone calls to the
contact numbers provided and left a message. Departed the facility at 10:50 am.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:18 am on
05/28/2015.  Inspector attempted to make contact by ringing and knocking on the door.  Made telephone calls to the
contact numbers provided and left a message.  Departed  the facility at 10:50 am.
